Articles.Content: With saved games all bugged out, I don't want to create the same vessel each time I need to create a new campaign.

You can find the files in C:\Users\yourusername\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Saves\SinglePlayer\savename\Workspaces

Alternatively if you can open saved workspace you can pick a craft by root part, Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V in a text editor. Then just do the same but backwards in a new save.

There is also a base game Workspaces folder at “C:\Users\yourusername\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Saves\SinglePlayer\Workspaces” I think (might be a folder one level lower, I’m on a tablet and can’t check at the moment).

You could copy all the files from your campaign Workspaces folder to this lower level Workspace folder and then all campaigns will see all the craft in it. That’s handy if you’d like to start new campaigns from time to time but would like to retain your ship designs
